title: After numerous amounts of reworks to Guinsoo's Rageblade, what do you think of this new iteration?

replies.body: Just remove this dumbass item from the game

exactly 

another buff to jax yi ect

hell even irelia is going to go back to rageblade frozen fist build...

> [{quoted}](name=Death by Glamour,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ln1opK5x,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-11-12T22:30:26.076+0000)
>
> exactly 
> 
> another buff to jax yi ect
> 
> hell even irelia is going to go back to rageblade frozen fist build...

They don't understand that almost every single Rageblade user doesn't give a damn about the extra damage it applies, it just makes stupid interactions like {{champion:67}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:145}} {{champion:11}} requiring less auto to trigger their stuff

it's a nerf to every rageblade user and nerfs kai'sa the least

what

how exactly is this a nerf

armour and magic pen on the one item + the same passive 

no one buys this for the AD/AP its all about that passive
you're wrong, the damage it gave and the scaling on hit it applied were massive chunks of most users DPS

I have to agree here. You also have to remember that it is % armor/magic pen, not flat armor pen, and it only scales with champion level. Champs who rush this will likely get it by lvl 6 or 7, so, they are running with only 9% armor/magic pen.....which is just shy of 1% less than Last Whisper, and not even close to what Void Staff gives you.

Even at lvl 18, where it's at it's strongest, it gives FAR less armor/magic pen than either Lord Dominik's or Void Staff, giving only 15% armor/magic pen, which is hardly more powerful than Last Whisper.

So, if anything, I see this as just a means for hybrid users to *kind of* cut through tanks better.

It's also giving less pen than {{item:3033}}, which gives 25% pen at all levels vs 15% _at level 18_ from new Rageblade. This item is the only source of Grievous Wounds for most AD champions, so unless you're willing to shell out money for a {{item:3165}}, new rageblade can lock you out of an important item for countering heal-heavy champions.

Overall I feel like the %AD and %AP, alongside the scaling passive damage, is a lot more valuable to on-hit champions than the pen is, since one of the biggest strengths of hybrid damage is the fact that it's difficult to itemize against, due to the fact that there aren't very many items that give both Armor and Magic Resist and there are even less that grant both stats AND health (the only one being {{item:3193}} with its active, which I'm not sure counts).

the on-hit+stats was alot stronger than the rather low pen it offers now, so it's overall quite a nerf.
Still a bad design though.

trash
trash
and trash

basically they had no more idea on how to make guinsoo shit in early game, so this happens:

"hey guys, change %bonus ad/ap to %pen, and while %pen is weaker in early **WE WILL MAKE IT 6% RAMPING UP TO 15 THROUGH LVLS**!!!"

basically, {{champion:96}} lost a huge amount of powerspike, and late game is similar or worse idk, the numbers would be tough to make but his %bonus ad made him critting way more.
Well Kog Maw is balanced pretty much entirely around this and other on-hit items. He would 100% be changed to match the Guinsoo changes.

To be fair, Kogmaw need some help more than an item that allow him to survive/not be trash.

I hope they prepare proper buff for him if he fall down...

Isn't botrk a good first item for him in replacement?

It doesn't deal the same damage as guinsoo 1st item
you can make the experience yourself really, tho if you do it in practice mode remember that the targets have 10 000 hp or something like that.
"{{champion:96}} lost a huge powerspike" How though he is the one rageblade user who benefited from the extra stats the least after Master Yi

tbf you can play AP kog, and that's why I do if my team is full ad, and it works well it's like AP kai'sa with rageblade+guinsoo+ap

but even if you build AD kog, you want to build crit and IE and combined with rageblade %bonus ad the crit becomes really big and hurts.
Which is why Uzi only built this when kog wasn't out of the meta.
But even if you build AD, the AP you get from the passive+normal stats is very good for the on-hit damage + W scaling+ AP scaling on other spells

I honestly think it's hard to say.

As a pen item, doesn't seem like its going to be rushed anymore, and that's going to mean that guinsoo's users have to rush other items. So what kind of effect it has kind of depends on the particular user we wanted to talk about. It's probably a net nerf to the item, which I think is probably a good thing, but I woudn't be shocked to see it help the late games of at least some users.

Kinda depends on how the stat changes and other stuff turns out in the preseason.
Come to think of it I think this might become a LW replacement for almost every ADC.
It's nowhere near as effective as a pen item as LDRs, and it gives a ton of useless stats for crit ADCs.

Well after looking it up it quite literally is a Last Whisper item. And yeah misunderstood OP, thought it was a stacking effect.

This just looks like a straight gutting of the item for everyone including the abuse cases like Yi.

Hopefully now the champions that actually need it to function will be the only ones given balance changes to use it.
Fking shit for its price. As a Kayle main, I'd still pick it up for phantom hit regardless of the changes, but the price does not justify the stats it currently has.

Kayle rework soon and hopefully before then they just buff up Kayle herself since this is kind of core on her.

I think the best place to look is just her base AD scaling and base damage scaling on E since AP Kayle (not on-hit) is relatively unaffected by this.

They also changed Void Staffs **UNIQUE** Passive.
https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-YvNGHjrwMeI/W-ntyFI2gYI/AAAAAAABK8I/TW2WkeoWZ8U0yJNEeTAtHQM8mgMI5-amQCLcBGAs/s1600/void.png

The name of the passive is now _**Dissolve**_, which is also the same name of the Magic Penetration passive on Guinsoo's. This also applies with Lord Dominik's/Mortal Reminder's _**Last Whisper**_ Passive. 

More over, I feel like this change was done so that the Armor/Magic Penetration recieved from Guinsoo's can't be stacked with other Pen Items. If they stacked, then it might have been a problem for those who could benefit from having a combination of these Items.

Personally I don't see the point of them making the passive unique when the game caps you at 40% magic pen anyway...

There isn't a cap on Magic Pen...

That's CDR

> [{quoted}](name=Terozu,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ln1opK5x,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2018-11-13T00:43:08.305+0000)
>
> There isn't a cap on Magic Pen...
> 
> That's CDR

No, there is, lol. When I took the 7% of the magic pen back in season 7 with void staff it didnt give me 42% it gave me 35%. I'm not talking about CDR. People on these boards don't ever test anything.

That's because magic pen stacks multiplicatively, which makes stacking Magic Pen less effective.

If you had %magic pen from sources outside of that rune and Void Staff, it would have put you at above 40%.

unless they buff the pen on rageblade I rly doubt that someone who buys void staff would want rageblade instead even if it is some ap AA reliant champ
That looks weak as fuck. 15% pen isn't shit, not to mention you don't even get the 15 until you're level 18. Guinisoo's Rageblade will be a complete shit item after that change.

I wonder how much Winrate-Wise my main champion (Varus) will be affected...

He's still one of the worst Marksman, even if lots of people play him.

This iteration no longer scales off AD/AP. It will be purely an on-hit item so my guess is you would have to start building a lot of on-hit items on Varus if you want him to succeed now using this version of the Rageblade. Varus builds could start including items like {{item:3153}} {{item:3115}} {{item:3091}}.
Kog maw would be so disgusting with this as well as Kai Sa. although squishy as hell.

I don't think 15% pen at level 18 is anything special. I think all current users will be far weaker with this version. Only champ I think of that would actually want to build this now is Shyvana since she does both magic and physical damage in an almost equal ratio. A little bit of pen on her could actually maker her a bit stronger but nothing to go crazy over. It will make it just barely viable on her.
Erasing 15% of a champs MR and armour is a large amount. Especially on champions that can tank bust (Kai'Sa, Kog etc.)

35% is barely enough to deal with tanks.

And you're talking about 15%, lmao
15% on champions that **already **deal %HP damage is still a lot.
it isn't if said champ lost a fucking ton of %ad/ap

It's even unnoticeable.

Even their hp shred is complete waste and valueble only because of second rage passive.

i love it fam
 
perfect Volibear item
#It's a nerf to every rageblade user and nerfs kai'sa the least.
Plus it nerfs AP dps (particularly {{champion:10}} ) the most

> [{quoted}](name=AirKingNeo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ln1opK5x,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2018-11-12T23:50:16.517+0000)
>
> #It's a nerf to every rageblade user and nerfs kai'sa the least.

If anything it buffs kai'sa late game power to shred tanks

As a {{champion:10}} main, I feel that this is a pretty big nerf. Mainly because she likes the large amount of AP the current Rageblade grants, and doesn't benefit that much from the pen the new one gives because she already has % pen on her passive.

Riot's balance team weren't always this arrogant. When there was an item that made your next 3 auto attacks crits. they decided to remove it from the game since there was no way to make it a non-toxic item.

Rageblade is an item that is either going to be incredibly weak or incredibly strong because of the interaction it has with some champion's on hit abilities. Same thing with dusk blade and champions that can re-stealth. Same thing with Storm Razor + Predator Hecarim. 

Zero forethought. Just random items.
